text: This page details football records in Slovakia. ==Team records== ===Most championships won=== ====Overall==== * 8, Slovan Bratislava (1993–94, 1994–95, 1995–96, 1998–99, 2008–09, 2010–11, 2012–13, 2013–14) ====Consecutives==== * 3, ŠK Slovan Bratislava (1993–94, 1994–95, 1995–96) * 3, MŠK Žilina (2001–02, 2002–03, 2003–04) ===Most seasons in Slovak Liga=== * 19, MŠK Žilina * 19, FC Spartak Trnava ==Total titles won== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:99%;
